external_games.name: Dice Hunter: Quest of the Dicemancer
Dice Hunter: Quest of the Dicemancer

name: Dice Hunter: Quest of the Dicemancer
summary:
Dice Hunter is a unique turn-based RPG with collectible dice. Master its clever combination of skill and luck. Enjoy tactical battles now!
Become a Dicemancer and assume the incredible ability to capture creatures into dice. Hunt dice and wield them to save the Land of Chance from the marauding minions and evil allies of the wicked Snake Eyes.
